resources.string: Allows linear movements (left, right, back, forward). Tap to enable.
Allows rotational movements with fixed stemi. Tap to enable.
Combination of movement and rotation. Tap to enable.
Tap to manually adjust the height of STEMI\'s body.
Tap to manually adjust the position of each joint on each leg.
Have three legs standing on the ground supporting the body while the other three swing forward. Fastest Gait.
Have three legs standing on the ground supporting the body while the other three swing forward. Lifting and lowering of each leg is slightly delayed to feel more lifelike.
At every moment there are two legs swinging in the air while other four stand on the ground supporting the body. This is the coolest Gait of all but a bit slower than Tripod Gaits.
Only one leg is swinging lifted in the air while all other stand on the ground supporting the body. This is the slowest Gait but consumes less power and can carry more weight.
Make sure your STEMI Hexapod is charged, turned on and connected to your phone or home network via wifi.
UNABLE TO CONNECT TO YOUR STEMI HEXAPOD
Select motor \n you wish to \n calibrate
If you have a STEMI Hexapod, simply connect it now.
